about_the_game:
About The Game.


100 Dogs - The goal of the game is to find dogs! The game has several levels and various musical accompaniment that will not get bored.

Someone will say - "Nah, it's easy".


Think everything is simple? Some of the dogs are really well hidden, so if you complete all the levels without hints, it will be amazing.

Leeeevels.


Make your way through the labyrinths of cleverly hidden levels full of surprises and puzzles. Explore a wide variety of places - from busy city streets to mysterious forests and abandoned ruins. Each new location presents unexpected challenges and much more.

  • City
  • Western
  • Coming soon
  • Super Coming soon
  • Mega Coming soon
  • (And so on)

short_description: 100 Dogs - The goal of the game is to find dogs! You will find several levels and a variety of musical accompaniment that will not let you get bored. Test your powers of observation in the pursuit of 100 unlucky adventurers.
